love.name: Love
items: Do they love me?
What does our future look like?
Will we reconcile?
Will I meet someone special soon?
How can I improve my love life?
Is my partner honest with me?

work.name: Work
items: Will I get the job I want?
What career path awaits me?
Is it time to change jobs?
How can I advance at work?
Will my effort be recognized?
How can I find a job that fulfills me?

health.name: Health
items: Will I recover?
What should I pay attention to?
How can I improve my health?
Is the current treatment the right choice?
How can I improve my mental health?
Should I seek a second opinion?

finance.name: Finances
items: How can I improve my finances?
Is it a wise investment?
Will I have financial stability?
How can I manage my money more wisely?
Will I pay off my debts?
Is a gain coming my way?

spiritual.name: Spiritual growth
items: What is my purpose?
What is my soul telling me?
What should I work on spiritually?
What is the next step in my growth?
How can I find inner peace?
What lesson keeps repeating for me?

family.name: Family & relationships
items: How can I improve family relationships?
Will the situation in the family calm down?
How can I help a family member?
Will my relationship with [name] improve?
How can I support my partner?
Are we expecting peace at home?
